lines.text: [Lloyd enters the room, slams the door in anger and collaspes on the ground]
Where's the booze?
I got robbed by a sweet old lady on a motorized cart. I didn't even see it coming.
(Groans) oh no ... no
Oh, come on Harry. Cheer up.
No, it gets worse Lloyd, my paraquee petee...
Yea?
He's dead.
awww, oh man I'm sorry Harry, how did he die?
His head fell off.
His head fell off?
Yeah he was pretty old.
[Lloyd walks over to petey's cage]
Awww, that's it. I've had it with this dump. We've got no food, we got no jobs. Are pets heads are falling off!
Okay, just calm down.
What the hell are we doing here Harry? We've got to get out of this town.
Oh yeah? and go where?
I'll tell you where... Some place warm. A place where the beer flows like wine. Where beautiful women instinctively flock like the salmon of Capistrano...
I'm talking about a little place called, Aspen.
I don't know LLoyd the French are assholes... wait a minute.
[Harry Stand up]
Wait a minute, I know what you're up to mister.
Yeah, you just want to find that girl who lost her briefcase, and you need me to drive you there. Right? Am I right?
Yeah? So?
Am I right?
YEAH? SO?
So I want to go someplace where we know somebody who can plug us into the social pipeline.
No, no, no, no, NO! LLoyd. I say we stay here, we hunt for jobs and keep saving our money for the worm store.
Now I dont' know about you but I'm getting sick and tied of running for creditors.
You know what I'm sick of Harry? I'm sick and tired of having to eek my way through life... I'm sick and tired of being a nobody... And most of all... I'm sick of having nobody.
Alright LLoyd.
Aspen it is.
[Harry opens his arms inviting Lloyd in for a hug]
You better not be foolin...'
[Harry and Lloyd embrace eachother and they hug. Lloyd starts crying while Harry comforts him.]
